product_name: Kiss My Face AfterPlay Moisture Creme - 6 fl. oz. - 2014 Closeout
long_description: After a long day in the sun using sunscreens, soothe your skin with this whipped creme lotion enriched with skin-nourishing antioxidants including Shea butter, olive oil and vitamin E.
short_description: After a long day in the sun using sunscreens, soothe your skin with this whipped creme lotion enriched with skin-nourishing antioxidants including Shea butter, olive oil and vitamin E.
